actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the reduction in disability benefits which is presently required in the case of an individual receiving workmen's compensation benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the reduction in disability benefits under Title II (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act which is presently required in the case of an individual receiving workmen's compensation benefits for months after January 1973. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 424)

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the reduction in disability benefits which is presently required in the case of an individual receiving workmen's compensation benefits.
